attributes.action: General Election BEFORE Scottish Referendum:  100,000 votes needed urgently
attributes.additional_details:
I am BRITISH... Born and Bread in Scotland... and that is how i wish to stay......

Sign this petition if you think that the UK should hold a General Election BEFORE the Scottish Referendum on Independance.

This would ensure that all votes counted would be submitted by electors who are entitled to vote according to UK Law.

This is relevant to ALL UK citizens, not just to us in Scotland.

However, if the SNP are voted to remain the leading party in Scotland then the referendum should go ahead.

In the same way, If the people of Scotland vote in another party then the referendum should be cancelled.

THIS IS IMPORTANT TO ALL OF US - PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION
WE NEED 100,000 VOTES!!!!

.
